snippet: The team behind Roberta’s, the pizzeria in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, has quietly opened a new restaurant.
abstract: Team behind Roberta’s, the pizzeria and do-it-yourself lifestyle cooperative on Moore Street in Bushwick, Brooklyn, has quietly opened a new restaurant, Blanca; new restaurant seats only 12 and diners sit on luxuriously padded captain’s chairs set before a wide bar facing the open kitchen with its ranges and work stations, digital convection oven and immense pressurized braising pan.
lead_paragraph: The team behind Roberta’s, the pizzeria in the Bushwick neighborhood of Brooklyn, has quietly opened a new restaurant.

headline.seo: Blanca Is a Sleek Surprise Around Back of Roberta’s
headline.main: A Sleek Surprise Around Back of Roberta’s
